description: The underlying Cause of the issues described relates to the vulnerabilities present in the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) partition on deployed devices. Specifically, the situation is a result of security weaknesses that may allow unauthorized access or exploitation, particularly linked to CVE-2024-20666. This vulnerability is addressed in the KB Article ID KB-5034957, which provides guidance on updating the WinRE partition to mitigate these risks. A sample PowerShell script is included in the KB article that assists administrators in executing the necessary updates. IT professionals managing these systems must ensure they apply the recommended actions to secure their environments against these vulnerabilities.
